title: How do i turn on the new client?
body: So i switched back to the old legacy client but now i wanna turn on the new client/alpha. Does anyone know how i can do that?

replies.body:
I'm not sure how you originally *switched back*, but you can upgrade to the Beta Client from the patcher at any moment:

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI

I hope this helped!
